title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister higher education research innovation science) order 2020

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 2. Sarah Bardon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sarah Bardon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science, Marlborough Street, Dublin 1, is appointed to be a 
Special Adviser to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science with effect from 2 August 2020.
text_norm: 2 sarah bardon particular whose address deposited office department higher education research innovation science marlborough street dublin 1 appointed special adviser minister higher education research innovation science effect 2 august 2020

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: Joanne Lonergan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. 

Joanne Lonergan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science, Marlborough Street, Dublin 1, is appointed to be a 
Special Adviser to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science with effect from 2 August 2020. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 October, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th October, 2020.
